[Music]
hi and welcome you're listening to the
x22 report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1091 a and today's date is
October 3rd 2016 and the thought of the
episode is we are witnessing the
economic collapse in real time let's get
into the economic collapse financial
news now we've been watching this
economy for quite a while and we've been
reporting on it we've been looking at
all the economic indicators and we are
seeing that we're at this point we're at
a crossroads where the central bankers
are looking at the economy looking at
world events and they're about to make a
decision a decision in what they do what
does that mean well we know the central
bankers want to bring this system down
they have to because they don't want
this system falling apart on its own it
will be blamed on them so they have to
bring it down and make it look like the
system came down because of X Y or Z
right now we see Deutsche Bank it is
failing will Germany bail it out will
the central bankers come to its rescue
maybe even though they're saying they're
not going to but we can see the central
bankers they're preparing for this
collapse they need to bring it down in
phase one and we can see we're getting
closer and closer to this point in time
and as we move forward here what we're
going to see is more vents more failures
and we have to watch very closely at
what the central bank does and we need
to watch what the US government does
because what we're seeing around the
world we're seeing the entire system
imploding all at once and it's going to
spread all over the place is going to
start out in Europe most likely and then
work its way in
they told us that Greece was fixed
everyone is happy there are no problems
out there but we see there are riots out
there Greek pensioners they're
protesting because of the cutbacks to
their benefits remember there's still
austerity in Greece and these pension
pensioners went out they marched to the
Prime Minister's tsipras office and
they're demanding no more austerity they
want their pensions well the police met
them and they block their path they were
spraying pepper spray and tear gas on
the people and once again we can see
that Greece is not fixed whatsoever
all there is is tape on top of tape on
top of tape holding it together Greece
is in a huge amount of debt unemployment
is skyrocketing
nothing has improved whatsoever it's
completely impossible to build an
economy like this yes for the creditors
for the bankers it's working out very
well for them we see out in France the
unemployment rate in France surged in
August to a 12-month high of 10.5% now
president how long said he will not run
for re-election unless the unemployment
rate is below 10% the question is will
the lying politicians keep their word
most likely not and he'll most likely
run no matter where the unemployment
numbers are they love power they never
want to give it up we see ing they're
planning to cut 7,000 jobs we know that
Commerce burn the Commerce Bank they're
laying off 9,000 people and we're going
to see more financial institutions
laying off more and more individuals
this reminds me of 2008 where
corporations were laying off right
before the stock market crash
and a lot of this is very similar I mean
Deutsche Bank looks like Bear Stearns
right now
maybe not the financials but what is
happening maybe even close to a Lehman
but we can see things are very very
similar
automakers they reported that US sales
in September and the demand for new cars
and trucks well they have completely
sputtered over all US sales were
expected to fall one percent to 1.4
million in September this is the fourth
month of declining sales this year and
this is coming from JD power and we see
that demand is slowing General Motors
fell one percent former Ford Motor
Company fell eight percent fiat-chrysler
fell by one percent and you have to
remember how the sales are calculated in
the auto industry when the manufacturers
deliver the cars to the dealerships
those are counted as sales and we can
see right now that this entire economy
has been manipulated to make us believe
that the economy's doing well but every
time we look at these economic
indicators what do we see we see the
opposite happening we see in the
restaurant industry this is an a leading
indicator of the US economy what we're
seeing a lot of restaurants declare
bankruptcy Logan's Roadhouse this is
which is a steakhouse with over 200
locations they've closed ten restaurants
declaring bankruptcy we see eight
restaurant companies representing 12
chains have filed for bankruptcy since
December the National Restaurant
Association reported on Friday that the
restaurant Performance Index fell by one
percent and is now contracting and it is
the worst reading since October of 2012
and when you look we're back at that
point where it contracted back in 2012
it contracted back in 2010 and right now
we're at 99
point six on the restaurant Performance
Index when we had the crash in 2008 they
dropped all the way down to 96 point
five but right before the crash it was
at 101 so we are below that already and
the trend right now is down so what
we're seeing right now is the situation
is getting worse and worse and they're
saying that same store sales are
declining customer traffic is drying up
and only 30 percent of the restaurant
operators reported a year-over-year
increase in same store sales that's down
from 71 percent in February we see us
construction spending signaling a
recession for the first time in five
years us construction spending fell what
we're seeing is everything declining
right now now what's very interesting it
fell to negative point three we are in a
downward trend in u.s. construction
spending we saw this back in 2006 going
into 2007 we had a dead cat bounce and
then boom everything fell apart we are
in the same position we were back in
2007 everything is not getting better it
is getting worse we see manufacturing
growth slowed to a crawl in September
this suggests that the economy is stuck
in a soft patch of the xviii
manufacturing industries 7 reported
growth in September and 11 reported
contraction and when we look at this we
can see that manufacturing again is a
downward trend we're in a dead cat
bounce the dead cow bounce is over and
it is falling once again we see the
Baltic Dry Index
falling to 864 points down 11 we know
out in Germany Deutsche Bank is in a
huge amount of trouble many clients out
there they were unable to access cash
due to the IT outage there was a glitch
in the system
was it really a glitch were they testing
something and we understand that the
Department of Justice well they're using
these fines on Deutsche Bank and the
fine is about 14 billion over its
mortgage-backed securities business
before 2008 global crisis and the
Germans are sitting there going this
looks like the u.s. is waging economic
war against which a bank now let's just
think about this for a second the
central bankers they understand that
these banks are insolvent yes they put
up the illusion that everything is fine
they passed the stress tests but they
realize that these banks are completely
insolvent one little thing brings them
down the US government central bankers
they understand this now why would they
place a 14 billion dollar fine against
Deutsche Bank to say you owe us this
from 2008 global crisis in the year of
2016 8 years later why are they doing
this now was this on purpose because
they knew exactly what was going to
happen if they did this just like they
know what's going to happen if they
maybe raise the interest rates or if the
ECB raises the interest rates or a Bank
of Japan raises the interest rates this
is why they haven't so are they keeping
Germany in line or have they started the
collapse of the system they needed
something to kick it off this way they
can point L
swear now most likely the corporate
media is not going to push you know push
this idea out there that the US
government central bankers are starting
the collapse but we can see right now it
does have the characteristics of an
economic war we know that Germany is
moving closer to Russia we know they
want to remove the sanctions that the
u.s. is trying to enforce against Russia
so is this being used to control Germany
and if they don't listen they will bring
down their economy and then of course as
we know this is going to spread never
remember the central bankers want this
to implode they might turn around and
blame this on Germany they want the
system to implode because the central
bankers they know they have nothing left
to use they need legislation passed to
take further control of the economy they
will start quantitative easing they will
lower the interest rates and most likely
buy equities and we know they're going
to do other things what they are well we
don't know right now but we know they're
in the works and they need to show the
system is coming down so they can bring
it back up and we know that period of
time from when it collapses the first
time to phase two is going to be a very
short window so they will have the next
event ready to go to blame it on another
country another group or even the
American people because we can see what
is happening right now we have the 911
bill which allows people to sue we see
people already starting the lawsuits
against Saudi Arabia Saudi Arabia
already threatened to sell the assets of
the United States moving closer to
Russia this is going to push Saudi
Arabia closer to Russia and we can see
they can use this to blame it on the
people because it's not going to be one
thing
everything is connected to this to this
economy we're in the petrodollar
Deutsche Bank the derivatives the
interconnectivity of all the banks what
is happening out in Saudi Arabia the
huge debt level everything is all
connected and the corporate media
they'll just come out and blame it on
anything they want I mean we hear
Deutsche Bank talking about speculators
I mean Nixon used this back in 1971 when
he took us off the gold standard they
will make up anything to explain why
this is collapsing as long it's as it's
not blamed on them because their plans
are to take further control of the
system to set us up for the main
collapse
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
